comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Wife of Alejandro Garland, the former secretary of the Peruvian legation. She and her husband were arrested on the charge of disturbing the peace in 1908, see The Washington times., August 09, 1908, Page 10 "GARLAND AND WIFE ARRESTED IN WEST"

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much for this research B-59.  The photo used in the Washington Times story in 1908 looks a lot like this one with the 1914 date that Wystan discovered.
